text: One of the most common questions you will hear travelling around China is “Where are you from?”This might be “你是哪国人?” or “你来自哪里?”. Both are asking where you come from.小明：Xiao Hong, are you English?小红：No I’m not. I am American. How about you?小明: I am Canadian. My father is Chinese. My mother is Canadian小红：Oh, there’s another Canadian in our class.小明：Really? Next time I will look for them.
